Summary: Watched UFO Decend On Vectored Path Into My Neighb
trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There were no other sightings in Albuquerque on or around July 7th 1992
divs: Sighting DetailsExercising in my backyard just before sunup, I watched a UFO decend 90 degreesstraight down from outerspace. At about 500 feet off ground it changed course tosouth, and then made a hard 452B degree to port left turn and headed east at tree top level into the city ofAlbuquerque. After about 10 seconds into its easterly decending course itvanished (cloaked!!). 300 foot spaceship, off-white in color with upper andlower domes, with blackened windows all around upper dome, and on bottom domehad huge black insignia that looked like capital letter H with a perpendicularbar thru the center bar of the letter H.
